Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubspec.data

Class PubspecEnvironment

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubspec.data.PubspecEnvironment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class PubspecEnvironment extends Object implements Serializable
Giving a requirement preference which indicating required SDK versions constraint is supported.
Although it has "setter" methods implemented, it's only creating new PubspecEnvironment with given data to be modified only, just like String.
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
  • SDK constraint in Dart documentation
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • PubspecEnvironment

      public PubspecEnvironment(@Nonnull PubSemVerConstraint sdk, @Nullable PubSemVerConstraint flutter) throws IllegalVersionConstraintException
      Create new environment preference of pubspec's environment.
      Parameters:
      sdk - Dart SDK constraint.
      flutter - Flutter constraint, null if not applied.
      Throws:
      IllegalVersionConstraintException - Applying sdk with PubConstraintPattern.CARET or missing lower constraint.

    • PubspecEnvironment

      public PubspecEnvironment(@Nonnull PubSemVerConstraint sdk) throws IllegalVersionConstraintException
      Create new environment preference of pubspec's environment without Flutter constraint.
      Parameters:
      sdk - Dart SDK constraint.
      Throws:
      IllegalVersionConstraintException - Applying sdk with PubConstraintPattern.CARET or missing lower constraint.

  • Method Details

    • sdk

      @Nonnull public PubSemVerConstraint sdk()
      Get current SDK constraint.
      Returns:
      A SDK version constraint data.

    • flutter

      @Nullable public PubSemVerConstraint flutter()
      Get current Flutter constraint.
      Returns:
      A Flutter version constraint data, null if not applied.

    • changeSDK

      @Nonnull public PubspecEnvironment changeSDK(@Nonnull PubSemVerConstraint sdk) throws IllegalVersionConstraintException
      Apply specified SDK constraint.
      Parameters:
      sdk - Indicate which SDK version will be applied.
      Returns:
      Another PubspecEnvironment which contains preferred SDK constraint.
      Throws:
      IllegalVersionConstraintException - Applying sdk with PubConstraintPattern.CARET or missing lower constraint.

    • changeFlutter

      @Nonnull public PubspecEnvironment changeFlutter(@Nullable PubSemVerConstraint flutter)
      Apply specified Flutter constraint.
      Parameters:
      flutter - Indicate which Flutter version will be applied, null when won't prefer.
      Returns:
      Another PubspecEnvironment which contains preferred Flutter constraint.
